H0.text: What is the stage name of American singer/songwriter Katheryn Elizabeth Hudson. Katy Perry

H1.text: What is the stage name of American singer/songwriter Katheryn Elizabeth Hudson. Liz Hudson

H2.text: What is the stage name of American singer/songwriter Katheryn Elizabeth Hudson. Kate Hudson

H3.text: What is the stage name of American singer/songwriter Katheryn Elizabeth Hudson. KatyCat

A4.text: She is known professionally as Katy Perry.

A5.text: In 2003, she briefly performed as Katheryn Perry, to avoid confusion with actress Kate Hudson, and later adopted the stage name 'Katy Perry', using her mother's maiden name.
